requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Pentium 4 Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 440
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Pentium 4 Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 730
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Any year 2010 +
  • Processor: AMD A8-7600 / Intel® Core™ i3-3210
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 460 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Supports Keyboard and gamepads
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Any Year 2020 +
  • Processor: AMD A8-7600 / Intel® Core™ i3-3210
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 560 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Supports Keyboard and gamepads
